entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
